text: Viral hemorrhagic fever is the name for a number of diseases. They often include fever and bleeding. They are caused by viruses. These fevers are one of the possible causes of the Black Death (most people think it is the bubonic plague)."Black Death did not kill indiscriminately." January 29, 2008, Will Dunham. Reuters. ==References== Category:Diseases caused by viruses
title: Viral hemorrhagic fever
